GSD.description:
parisc: Fix non-access data TLB cache flush faults

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit ddca4b82027e2a66333dd40fab21a4beff435c7e. For more details please see the references link.
